title: How do I save battery power?
answer: [Turn on power saving mode: go to Setting> Power Saving> Smart power saving/super power saving.]() Hold![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111755)ï¼Œturn off the applications you do not use temperioly. When you are not using the phone, press the power button to turn off the screen. Shorten the screen timeout period Lower the screen brightness Lower volume. Turn off Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Wlan, and GPS when you do not need to use them
